intent_atoms.description: Persisted bookmark identifiers must be annotated in audit events and failures must still redact paths while retaining ledger context.
Document session restoration passes bookmark identifiers into FilesystemAccessKit, refreshes stale records with new data, and removes failed ledger entries to keep recents accurate across launches.
Operators can correlate bookmark_id output with stored credentials via ledger-aware audit logging in the CLI sandbox guide.

functional_units.name: Persist Security-Scoped Bookmarks

functional_units.name: Document Session Restoration via Bookmark Identifiers
functional_units.description: Restores document sessions by passing bookmark identifiers into FilesystemAccessKit, refreshing stale records with new data, and removing failed ledger entries to keep recents accurate across launches.

functional_units.name: Bookmark Recovery Documentation
